title: Riot update wont let me play
body:
Hi guys
I had a problem this morning 
I start to play League and suddenly my monitor shut down and i turn on my monitor and nothing changed 
Btw i have a Belinea 15 inch LCD monitor and when that happened i get on my screen "UngÃ¼ltiger Modus "
One more thing i can hear the sound but no image is there
So i get a information that Riot Update do this to me,and that they are trying to fix it
Is this a true or not
Do somebody have the same problem?
Tnx

replies.body: This is a current issue per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) guide.  As a workaround, press Alt+Enter to get back in game until it's fully resolved.  I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Jq1KjUaN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-11T23:49:26.143+0000)
>
> This is a current issue per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) guide.  As a workaround, press Alt+Enter to get back in game until it's fully resolved.  I hope that helps!

is this mac only (I've seen lots of people say they are using the mac client)? I want detailes on the bug before I attempt to play.

I don't play games in windowed mode. My video card/operating system doesn't like it. So it's not really a "workaround" 

I use Windows btw, which is why I ask.

Similar problem here it seems, when I try to run the game the game .exe is running but no way to get it to show on screen... Hearing sounds pings notifications and all but no game to be seen. How is it possible to release such a broken build ?
